Play Now top definitions quizzes related content examples explore dictionary british porn pawrn SHOW IPA pɔrn /PHONETIC RESPELLING Informal.
SEE SYNONYMS FOR porn ON THESAURUS.COM noun Sometimes por·no pawr-noh /ˈpɔr noʊ/. pornography; sexually explicit videos, photographs, writings, or the like, produced to elicit sexual arousal often used attributively arrested for selling porn; porn star; porn films.
television shows, articles, photographs, etc., thought to cater to an excessive, irresistible desire for or interest in something: magazine filled with enticing food porn; an addiction to real-estate porn.
